original_text: All Solomon’s work was carried out, from the day the foundation of the temple of the Lord was laid until its completion. So the temple of the Lord was finished.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 전의 기초를 쌓던 날부터 준공하기까지 모든 것을 완비하였으므로 여호와의 전 공사가 결점 없이 끝나니라

sentences.original_text: All Solomon's work was carried out
from the day the foundation of the temple of the Lord was laid
So the temple of the Lord was finished
